About Me

A few things about me...

BIO

Gerald Jones is a front-end web developer living in Baton Rouge, LA area with his wife and son. He is a self-starter who transitioned from information technology to web development when he found a passion for creating and programming. Gerald loves to challenge himself and learn new things. He likes board games, traveling and spending time with family and friends.
